dialog.text: Did you get a chance to take any photographs in Antarctica?
I took some great pictures! I'd love to send you some.
dialog.persona_text: I've traveled to Antarctica.

problem_data.persona: I've traveled to Antarctica.

dialog.text: I would be super interested in seeing them! Antarctica has always been so interesting to me! What was your favorite part of your trip there?
dialog.persona_text: I'm interested in Antarctica.

problem_data.persona: I'm interested in Antarctica.

dialog.text: Sight seeing! Those mountains are majestic! It is really something best witnessed up close.
dialog.persona_text: I love sight seeing.

problem_data.persona: I love sight seeing.

dialog.text: Did you actually get to climb any mountains there? It must be difficult in the weather conditions!
No i'm too chicken to clime a mountain. I took a hiking trail though. Just as good.
dialog.persona_text: I do like hiking. I don't like mountain climbing.

problem_data.persona: I don't like mountain climbing. I do like hiking.

dialog.text: I could understand that. I'm shocked there's hiking trails there. Who would be able to spend much time outdoors in that climate? Is there any wildlife to see there?
Yes! Loads. We saw monkeys jumping about as we took a dip in a spring!
dialog.persona_text: I like to swim.

problem_data.persona: I like to swim.

dialog.text: That must have been such an amazing site to see! I've only seen monkeys in zoos.
dialog.persona_text: I like monkeys. I've visited zoos.

problem_data.persona: I've visited zoos. I like monkeys.

dialog.text: They are so playful and LOUD! Also, you'd probably love some of the recipes here to cook for yourself. Out of this world.
Yes I've heard that about monkeys. I've watched videos of them in the wild. What was your favorite recipe? I'd love to try it out!
dialog.persona_text: I enjoy cooking.

problem_data.persona: I enjoy cooking.

dialog.text: We did't cook at all. We stayed a couple days and went out to eat. But food there is heavy on spices. You like spicy food?
dialog.persona_text: I dislike spicy food.

problem_data.persona: I dislike spicy food.

dialog.text: Have you gone hiking anywhere lately?
Yeah, I've done a little bit of ice-trekking here and there. The weather isn't always friendly down here in Antarctica!
dialog.persona_text: I like to go ice-trekking. I live in Antartica.

problem_data.persona: I live in Antartica. I like to go ice-trekking.

dialog.text: I was thinking about you the other day when it got below zero here. I don't know how you do it!
Yeah, my research keeps me here but I hate the weather. It's pretty cold in Maine this time of year though. You're probably pretty tough to withstand that New England winter.
dialog.persona_text: I don't like cold weather. I do research in Antarctica.

problem_data.persona: I do research in Antarctica. I don't like cold weather.

dialog.text: I'm tough! If you think tough is turning up the heat, wearing two pairs of socks and never going outside in the winter.
dialog.persona_text: I don't like cold weather. I live in Maine.

problem_data.persona: I live in Maine. I don't like cold weather.

dialog.text: I've always wanted to visit Maine. I should come up and have a lobster roll. What is your favorite thing to cook? Do you cook any local seafood or do you just eat a lot of vegan things?
dialog.persona_text: I want to visit Maine.

problem_data.persona: I want to visit Maine.

dialog.text: I cook it all, no food discrimination from me. When you come up, we'll have a real New England clam bake. Lobster, steamers, corn on the cob...everything!
dialog.persona_text: I like to cook.

problem_data.persona: I like to cook.

dialog.text: That sounds incredible. Just don't make it too spicy. Are there any great spots for photography up there?
dialog.persona_text: I don't like spicy food. I like photography.

problem_data.persona: I don't like spicy food. I like photography.

dialog.text: Of course! Would you like to take some pictures of moose and bears?
No bears please! I was thinking more like a rocky seashore. Maybe my law firm will transfer me out of Antarctic soon and I can move closer. I think I would like your area. Maybe Boston.
dialog.persona_text: I would like to move to Boston.

problem_data.persona: I would like to move to Boston.

agg_persona_list: I would like to move to Boston.

dialog.text: We'll take a trip to Boston when you come up. It's a great day trip and only a couple hours from my house.
Do they have a zoo that you like there? I was thinking maybe June so I can thaw out. My wife and kids would like a getaway as well.
dialog.persona_text: I have a wife and kids. I like to go to the zoo.

problem_data.persona: I have a wife and kids. I like to go to the zoo.

dialog.text: How was your game tonight?  Did the music get you all pumped up?

Honestly, not so good. I ended up tearing my ACL and now I'm out for the rest of the season! I've been bummed about it all day. Our team ended up winning the game though, so I have mixed emotions about it.

dialog.text: Oh no! Man, I'm so sorry to hear that. Isn't there anything they can do to fix it? It's only the middle of the season.

Unfortunately no. Just a bunch of rest and physical therapy. You know how much basketball means to me, I'm trying to be strong but it's hard. What's even worse is that I'm supposed to give a motivational speech tomorrow and I'm scared I'm not going to do well. What would you do if you were in my situation?

dialog.text: How has your daughter's recovery from surgery been going?
My daughter never had any surgery, I see your daughter had one, how is she ?
dialog.persona_text: I have a daughter.

problem_data.persona: I have a daughter.

dialog.text: You're right, I'm sorry - I misremembered. How is your sister doing with her MS? My daughter is recovering well, thank you for asking.
dialog.persona_text: My daughter recently had surgery. I have a daughter.

problem_data.persona: I have a daughter. My daughter recently had surgery.

dialog.text: No problem, my sister is hanging in there , some days are okay and some days is not all there, just taking it one day at a time. So you like working as a nurse ?
dialog.persona_text: I have a sister. My sister has MS.

problem_data.persona: I have a sister. My sister has MS.

dialog.text: Yes, I enjoy working as a nurse. I see patients like that often - it can be difficult both on the patient and on those who care about them. Does your sister have a good support system to help her?
dialog.persona_text: I enjoy my job. I am a nurse.

problem_data.persona: I am a nurse. I enjoy my job.

dialog.text: Oh I see, my hat's off for you . It takes a lot to care for someone who is not related to you. Yes my sister have a good support system , it's just that we are very disappointed on her been cut off from disability, it is hard on us.
dialog.persona_text: My sister recently lost her disability benefits.

problem_data.persona: My sister recently lost her disability benefits.

agg_persona_list: My sister recently lost her disability benefits.

dialog.text: Yes, I can imagine that would be very difficult. Was your sister's doctor in agreement with that decision, or was it an insurance decision?
No way, the doctor was not in on it. Her employer said she is only qualified to get 3 months of disability and they cut it off as soon as she the 3 months elapsed.
agg_persona_list: My sister recently lost her disability benefits.

dialog.text: Oh darn, that doesn't sound right! Well I'm sorry to hear that, I'm sure it has a difficult impact on her life. Maybe a second opinion might help, if your sister really feels she is not able to work. I hope she's able to find the support she needs.

oh thanks for the understanding. We are seriously looking for help and hopefully we'll find her one. She has been through a lot and we refuse to let anything get in her way of recovery. We have a big family support system and it's very helpful in this trying times.So will be giving in on getting your daughter exotic pets ?
dialog.persona_text: My family is supporting my sister with her illness.

problem_data.persona: My family is supporting my sister with her illness.

agg_persona_list: My sister recently lost her disability benefits.
My family is supporting my sister with her illness.

Oh sure, to put a smile on her face, I'm sure she will be delighted to have you do that for her
